channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New York City may move its mayoral elections to even years. It'd be part of a trend
item.description: This fall, New York City voters will weigh in on a proposal that could move future city elections to even-numbered years. It's part of a growing trend...

item.title: Ukrainians Are Grateful but Skeptical After Trump’s Turnabout on the War
item.description: Whereas he once pressed Ukraine to take any deal, President Trump said he now believed that the country could win. Some Ukrainians seemed not to take ...

item.title: Israeli Strike Kills Gazans Sheltering in Warehouse, Local Reports Say
item.description: The Israeli attack in Gaza City killed nearly two dozen Palestinians, the reports said. The Israeli military said it had hit two “Hamas terrorists.”

item.title: Greetings from Guatemala, where one person's trash becomes another's colorful art
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: Love pumpkin spice lattes? Learn some of its spicy history
item.description: For NPR's Word of the Week: Things are getting spicy. We explain how a word referring to cinnamon and pepper turned less literal by the 19th century.
